_header: Saint Matthew the Evangelist apostle he was Iwis
Subjects: saints’ lives; Matthew, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Matthew in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Matheu þe euangelist apostel he was iwisEuangelist &
                    eke apostel boþe he was & is…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou ihesus ȝeue ous grace þulke Ioie to wynneVor
                    þe loue of seynt matheu þat is soule is Inne

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Matheu þe Ewangelist Apostel he was i wisEwangelist and
                    eke Apostel boþe he was and is…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu ȝif vs grace þat ilke Ioye to winneffor
                    þe loue of seint Matheu þat his holy soule is Inne. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Matheu þe ewangelist apostel he was and isEwangelist and
                    eke apostle for soþe he was and is (sic)…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nou Iesu crist us ȝiue is grace þulke Ioyȝe i
                    winneffor þe loue of Seint Matheu þat he woneth inne
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 77-81.

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Matheu þe euangelist apostel was y wisEuaungelist &
                    eke apostle boþe he was & is…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu Crist ȝeue vs grace þat ioye to wynneffor
                    þe love of saynt Matheu þere he now is ynne Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Mathewe þe euaungelist apostel was iwisEuaungelist and
                    eke apostel boþ he was and is…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu sende vs grace þat blisse for to wynneFor
                    þe loue of seint Mathewe þat his soule is Inne. Amen.
TokyoTak54.Attributed Title:
Vita sancti Mathei apostoli et euaungeliste (f.
                    137v)
